docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: 查看预览
docs.text:
cd xxx
mkdocs serve
在http://127.0.0.1:8000进行查看

docs.title: 配置主题
docs.text:
theme: 
  name: material
  language: zh
  custom_dir: docs/custom_theme
  palette:
    primary: 'Light Blue'
    accent: 'Light Blue'
  features:
    - navigation.tabs
  font:
    text: Microsoft YaHei
    code: Courier New

docs.title: 其他配置
docs.text:
markdown_extensions:
  - admonition
  - codehilite:
      guess_lang: false
      linenums: false
  - toc:
      permalink: true
  - footnotes
  - meta
  - def_list
  - pymdownx.arithmatex
  - pymdownx.betterem:
      smart_enable: all
  - pymdownx.caret
  - pymdownx.critic
  - pymdownx.details
  - pymdownx.emoji:
      emoji_generator: !!python/name:pymdownx.emoji.to_png
      #emoji_generator: !!python/name:pymdownx.emoji.to_svg
      #emoji_generator: !!python/name:pymdownx.emoji.to_png_sprite
      #emoji_generator: !!python/name:pymdownx.emoji.to_svg_sprite
      #emoji_generator: !!python/name:pymdownx.emoji.to_awesome
      #emoji_generator: !!python/name:pymdownx.emoji.to_alt
  - pymdownx.inlinehilite
  - pymdownx.magiclink
  - pymdownx.mark
  - pymdownx.smartsymbols
  - pymdownx.superfences
  - pymdownx.tasklist
  - pymdownx.tilde

extra:
  search:
    language: 'en,zh,jp'

plugins:
  - search

docs.title: 发布
docs.text:
1. github创建项目并clone到mkdocs目录
  2. 执行一下命令，工具就会自动将相应内容推送到项目的 gh-pages 分支上 
    mkdocs gh-deploy
  3. 浏览https://username.github.io/project-name

docs.title: 解决中文搜索问题
docs.text:
https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000018592279

  • 其中文件路径在win上不对，直接使用vscode打开python中的安装文件夹(Lib\site-packages\mkdocs)，搜索方法名即可
  • 修改时需要安装jieba，手动import jieba 
    pip install jieba

docs.title: windows
docs.text:
1. 新建python_home，添加安装路径，如图
  1. path中添加变量，如图
  1. 查看python版本，检测环境是否正常
python -V
  1. 查看pip版本
pip -V
